ch0059_00_katsura/0101_0701_01_10:
Hah!
Welcome back, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was waiting for you!
ch0059_00_katsura/0101_0701_02_10: Help me think of questions for my next quiz!
ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_01_10:
I am Blaine! 
I am the Gym Leader of Cinnabar Gym!
I’m also known as the Hotheaded Quiz Master!
ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_02_10:
My Pokémon are all hotheads that were raised
on Cinnabar Island!
ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_03_10:
Now that I’m here, you have nothing to
worry about.
ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_04_10:
If there’s anything you would like to know about
Pokémon, ask me!
ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0701_05_10: I’ll answer you in quiz fashion!
ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0702_01_10: The quizzes I think up are very popular!
ch0059_00_katsura/0601_0702_02_10:
All the Trainers who challenged me 
were happy to take them.
ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0701_02_10:
Climbing up those mountains is very liberating—
especially so if your Pokémon are at your side.
ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0701_03_10:
I once got lost and stranded on the mountain, but
there was a Pokémon that I saw there...
ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0701_04_10:
I could never forget that light that guided me,
and I went back many times to look for it.
ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0702_01_10:
Ever since the one time I got stranded on the
mountain, I’ve always gone hiking with Ponyta.
ch0059_00_katsura/0602_0702_02_10:
He’s a Fire Horse Pokémon that has sturdy legs
and can easily jump over cliffs and hills!
ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_01_10:
There is a facility called the Pokémon
Research Lab on Cinnabar Island.
ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_02_10:
They research very interesting things,
such as Pokémon Evolution and legends.
ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_03_10:
Rearranging genes is a practical way to explore
the infinite possibilities of Pokémon.
ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0701_04_10:
That’s some difficult stuff, but the researchers
at the lab all believe that they’re doing the
right thing.
ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0702_01_10:
Back in the day, Fuji and I toiled to unlock
those secrets, too...
ch0059_00_katsura/0603_0702_02_10:
And what we birthed...
Well, we thought it was a symbol of the true
potential of Pokémon at the time.
ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0701_01_10: I have a friend in Lavender Town.
ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0701_02_10:
His name’s Fuji, and back in the day, he was an
excellent researcher.
ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0701_03_10:
Now he manages a refuge for abandoned
Pokémon there.
ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0702_01_10:
If you ever find yourself in Lavender Town, pay
him a visit.
ch0059_00_katsura/0604_0702_02_10:
I’m sure a Trainer like you would be able to put
a smile on his face.
ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m thinking up quizzes, I take off
my sunglasses so that I can concentrate.
ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0701_02_10: Good ideas just come to me when I do so.
ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0701_03_10:
Maybe you could think some up, too.
It’s surprisingly easy to get hooked!
ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0702_01_10: Hm. I thought of a good quiz!
ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0702_02_10: Are Infernape sharp thinkers or poor?
ch0059_00_katsura/0605_0702_03_10:
They’re sharp!
They are INFERnape, after all!
ch0059_00_katsura/1701_0701_01_10: There you are! I wanted to give you something.
ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0701_01_10:
Hah! Let your youth—your spirit—burn bright,
young one!
ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0701_02_10:
Your youth can burn like a blazing flame, and
it can burn out just as easily!
ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0701_03_10:
Ignite your passion while you can!
That is the key to living a hot life!
ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0702_01_10:
Fire-type Pokémon are even hotter than their
names or appearances might seem!
ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0702_02_10:
They will lose to nobody when it comes to heat!
From their spirits, their bodies, even how they
look when they fight, they are hot and heartful!
ch0059_00_katsura/2501_0702_03_10:
In a battle, you should always let your passion
burn! That’s common knowledge when you fight
with Fire-type Pokémon!
ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0701_01_10:
Pasio tickles my thirst for both adventure and
exploration at the same time!
ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0701_02_10:
With it kindling my heart like this, it piques my
interest as a scientist and a Trainer!
ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0701_03_10:
Of course, I’m interested about you, too!
Burn the fire in your heart, and challenge me!
ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0702_01_10:
What I want is a Pokémon battle that’s as
intense as the lava that spews out of a volcano!
ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0702_02_10:
And I get the feeling I’ll get that from you
one day!
ch0059_00_katsura/2511_0702_03_10:
Now! Let’s ignite our spirits! Our bodies!
Ignite and let this battle burn to cinders!
ch0059_00_katsura/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. A beautiful day, isn’t it? Even
the Pokémon seem to be bright and chipper!
ch0059_00_katsura/3002_0701_01_10:
*yawn*
Oh, excuse me! I got carried away
thinking up quizzes late last night.
ch0059_00_katsura/3003_0701_01_10:
Brilliant weather today! What’s that?
The glare off my head is blinding you?
ch0059_00_katsura/3004_0701_01_10:
Always make sure you eat proper meals! Using
your thinking cap burns calories, you know.
ch0059_00_katsura/3005_0701_01_10:
Hm? Does the darkness make you nervous?
In that case, I suppose my Pokémon could use
its flame.
ch0059_00_katsura/3006_0701_01_10:
Such a wonderful night! Nights like these always
seem to inspire the best quiz questions!
